title: Drawing, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Lighting", 1933
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper left: The base has/not already been/ installed.; at center left: Mr Deskey: The height of the/base in my judgement/should be 6" however the detail/can be as per any profile you/ care to make it. We will/ however use yours truly's latest "The/Running Out let Mould" in connection/with the base./Give me your/criticism rush/ MB[?]. Inscribed in graphite with instructions throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Lighting", 1933.
1933. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-278.
